step3_mechanic.rule: Both reach the top. One arrives exhausted.
step3_mechanic.y_maps_to: Elevator = vibe coding, same floor, no sweat

step4_quotes: The view is the same from the top.
One arrived first. One arrived tired.
The building does not reward the stairs.

step4_best.line1: What ignoring vibe coding feels like:
step4_best.line2: Taking the stairs to the 50th floor when the elevator is right there.

step5_visual: A single elevator door, open, empty, waiting.
step5_dalle_prompt: A single open elevator door with empty interior, waiting. Flat 2D vector. Pure black background. White shapes only. No gradients. No texture. No shadows. No extra objects. No ground. Minimal. Bauhaus poster style. Centered.
